thread.title: 10 healthy, growing companies that can help you beat the stock market
thread.title_full: 10 healthy, growing companies that can help you beat the stock market - MarketWatch

author: MarketWatch
title: 10 healthy, growing companies that can help you beat the stock market
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE Gilead, Balchem and eight others produce strong sales and profits, and relatively low valuations, says Phil van Doorn. See full story.
The 7 most popular used cars among millennials A look at the used cars millennials buy the most often, as compiled by Edmunds.com. See full story.
Ellen Pao’s deal allows her to remain a symbol for sexism in tech Ellen Pao, who boldly sued venerable venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers for sexual discrimination, will now remain synonymous with the issue of sexism in tech, even though she was ultimately defeated in her lengthy battle. See full story.
Brazil’s economy will likely get worse before it gets better Brazil is experiencing its worst economic downturn in 25 years. And, analysts say, it’s going to get worse before it gets better. See full story.
6 lessons for the sandwich generation It’s never easy taking care of parents and children at the same time. But it can be done — with a little help and guidance. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
